Both the long and short ton are defined as 20 hundredweights, but a hundredweight is 100 pounds (45.359237 kg) in the US system (short or net hundredweight) and 112 pounds (50.80234544 kg) in the Imperial system (long or gross hundredweight).

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Gross Ton
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Gross tonnage (GT) is a function of the volume of all ship's enclosed spaces (from keel to funnel) measured to the outside of the hull framing. There is a sliding scale factor. So GT is a kind of capacity-derived index that is used to rank a ship for purposes of determining manning, safety and other statutory requirements and is expressed simply as GT, which is a unitless entity, even though its derivation is tied to the cubic meter unit of volumetric capacity.Tonnage measurements are now governed by an IMO Convention (International Convention on Tonnage Measurement of Ships, 1969 (London-Rules)), which applies to all ships built after July 1982. In accordance with the Convention, the correct term to use now is GT, which is a function of the moulded volume of all enclosed spaces of the ship.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Net Ton
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: Net tonnage (NT) is based on a calculation of the volume of all cargo spaces of the ship. It indicates a vessels earning space and is a function of the moulded volume of all cargo spaces of the ship.

S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:label: Suez Canal Net Tonnage
S100FC:listedValue.S100FC:definition: The Suez Canal Net Tonnage (SCNT) is derived with a number of modifications from the former net register tonnage of the Moorsom System and was established by the International Commission of Constantinople in its Protocol of 18 December 1873. It is still in use, as amended by the Rules of Navigation of the Suez Canal Authority, and is registered in the Suez Canal Tonnage Certificate.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Vessels Characteristics Value
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: The value of a particular characteristic such as a dimension or tonnage of a vessel.
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Indicates range limits in expressions characterizing vessels by dimensions and tonnages. The unit of measure, characteristic, and comparison operator (greater, less, etc.) are encoded separately.

S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:name: Vessel Performance
S100FC:S100_FC_SimpleAttribute.S100FC:definition: A description of the required handling characteristics of a vessel including hull design, main and auxiliary machinery, cargo handling equipment, navigation equipment and manoeuvring behaviour.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Area A3 Service Description
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Description of the radio service for area A3 of the Global Maritime Distress and Safety System (GMDSS).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Bearing Information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A bearing is the direction one object is from another object.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Broadcast Content
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Details related to the content of the broadcast.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Contact Address
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Direction or superscription of a letter, package, etc., specifying the name of the place to which it is directed, and optionally a contact person or organisation who should receive it.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Coverage Indication
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Details related to the indication of the radio coverage.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Feature Name
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Provides the name of an entity, defines the national language of the name, and provides the option to display the name at various system display settings.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Fixed Date Range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: An active period of a single fixed event or occurrence, as the date range between discrete start and end dates.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Dates must be encoded in the format YYYYMMDD; using 4 digits for the calendar year (YYYY) and, optionally, 2 digits for the month (MM) (for example April = 04) and 2 digits for the day (DD). When no specific month and/or day is required/known, the values are replaced with dashes (-). The date range of a recurring event or occurrence must be encoded using periodicDateRange.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Frequency Pair
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A pair of frequencies for transmitting and receiving radio signals. The shore station transmits and receives on the frequencies indicated.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Frequency Range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Frequency range of the electromagnetic spectrum in which the transmission is provided.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Graphic
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Pictorial information such as a photograph, sketch or other graphic, optionally accompanied by descriptive information about the graphic and the location relative to its subject from which it was made.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Horizontal Position Uncertainty
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The best estimate of the accuracy of a position.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Information
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Textual information about the feature. The information may be provided as a string of text or as a file name of a single external text file that contains the text.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: At least one of the sub-attributes file reference or text must be populated.The sub-attribute file reference is generally used for long text strings or those that require formatting, however, there is no restriction on the type of text (except for lexical level) that can be held in files referenced by sub-attribute file reference.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Online Resource
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Information about online sources from which a resource or data can be obtained.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Orientation
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: (1) The angular distance measured from true north to the major axis of the feature. (2) In ECDIS, the mode in which information on the ECDIS is being presented. Typical modes include: north-up - as shown on a nautical chart, north is at the top of the display; Ships head-up - based on the actual heading of the ship, (e.g. Ships gyrocompass); course-up display - based on the course or route being taken.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Periodic Date Range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The active period of a recurring event or occurrence.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Radio Channel Details
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Details related to the radio channel used in the radio service.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Radiocommunication Identifier
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Identifiers of the radio station in various maritime radiocommunication services.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: RxN Code
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A summary of the impact of the most common types of regulation, restriction, recommendation and nautical information on a vessel.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Schedule by Day of Week
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The nature and timings of a daily schedule by days of the week.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Sector Limit
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A sector is the part of a circle between two straight lines drawn from the centre to the circumference. The sector limit specifies the limits of the sector In a clockwise direction around the central feature (for example a light).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Sector Limit One
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A sector is the part of a circle between two straight lines drawn from the centre to the circumference. Sector limit one specifies the first limit of the sector. The order of sector limit one and sector limit two is clockwise around the central feature (for example a light).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Sector Limit Two
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A sector is the part of a circle between two straight lines drawn from the centre to the circumference. Sector limit two specifies the second limit of the sector. The order of sector limit one and sector limit two is clockwise around the central feature (for example a light).

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Spatial Accuracy
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Provides an indication of the vertical and horizontal positional uncertainty of bathymetric data, optionally within a specified date range.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Survey Date Range
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The complex attribute describes the period of the hydrographic survey, as the time between its sub-attributes.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Telecommunications
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: A means or channel of communicating at a distance by electrical or electromagnetic means such as telegraphy, telephony, or broadcasting.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: If no value is populated for the sub-attribute telecommunication service, this means the service is by voice communication. If no value is populated for the sub-attribute telecommunication carrier, this means the service is by land line communication.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Text Content
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Textual material, or a pointer to a resource providing textual material. May be accompanied by basic information about its source and relationship to the source.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Exactly one of sub-attributes onlineResource or information must be completed in one instance of textContent. Product specifications may restrict the use or content of onlineResource for security. For example, a product specification may forbid populating onlineResource. Product specification authors must consider whether applications using the data product may be prevented from accessing off-system resources by security policies.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Time Intervals by Day of Week
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The regular weekly operation times of a service or schedule.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Times of Transmission
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: One or more times in the day when the radio station starts a routine transmission, normally expressed in UTC or local time.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Vertical Uncertainty
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: The best estimate of the vertical accuracy of depths, heights, vertical distances and vertical clearances.

S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:name: Vessel Measurements Specification
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:definition: Combinations of values of measurable characteristics or dimensions of vessels, used to specify size and tonnage ranges.
S100FC:S100_FC_ComplexAttribute.S100FC:remarks: Combines (i) specifications of vessels' measurable characteristics (length, beam, tonnages, etc.), (ii) limit values for the specified characteristics (with units), (iii) arithmetical comparison operators (greater than, etc.), and (iv) logical operators (AND/OR) to define a subset of vessels characterized by the specified ranges. For example, the combination (draught, 10.5, metres, greaterThan) describes "vessels with draught greater than 10.5 metres".

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Applies in location
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The location in which the information item applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Authority
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an Authority object

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Authority service hours
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The authority for which service hours are given

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Connectivity Service Area
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The area where the connectivity service is provided.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Connectivity Service Provider
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The provider of the connectivity service.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Contact details
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an Contact Details object

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Coordinated Service
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The coordinated service area.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Coordinating Authority
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The authority coordinating the service provision.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Is applicable to
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The object or class of objects to which the regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Location service hours
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The location for which service hours are given

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Partial working day
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The work hours for a non-standard workday

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Permission
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: Association class for associations describing whether the subsets of vessels determined by the ship characteristics specified in APPLIC may (or must, etc.) transit, enter, or use a feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Service area
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The area served by a service provider

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Service Hours (reference)
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: Service hours for an authority ore service provider

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Service place
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: Pointer to service or facility

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Service provider
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: Pointer to a feature from where a provider supplies a service

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The applicable RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The applicable regulation, restriction, recommendation or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Broadcast Details
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The details of the broadcast service, such as the content and schedule.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Cartographic Text
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific cartographically positioned location for text.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Collection
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to the aggregate in a whole-part relationship.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Component
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a part in a whole-part relationship.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Control Centre
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to the centre controlling or operating the service.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Controlled Service
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to the controlled or operated service.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Information
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an object that provides more information about the referencing feature or information type.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The organisation
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The organisation to which information relates

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Position Provider
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to a specific feature(s).

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The QoS
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The connectivity QoS information for the area.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The QoS Area
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The area where the connectivity QoS information applies.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Quality Information
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: A pointer to an information type providing spatial quality information.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The service hours for a non-standard workday
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The usual service hours to which an exception applies

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Transmission Details
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The details of the radio transmission service.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: The Telemedical Assistance Service
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The details of the Telemedical Assistance Service.

S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:name: Vessel location
S100FC:S100_FC_Role.S100FC:definition: The location to which the permission statement applies

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Additional information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between at least one instance of a geo feature and an instance of an information type.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Associated RxN
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association between a geographic location and a regulation, restriction, recommendation, or nautical information

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Available Quality of Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Available Quality of Service (QoS) within the area.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Broadcast Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The broadcast content and schedule of a service area or facility

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Broadcast Transmission
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The transmission details for the broadcast or the broadcast details available from the transmission

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Connectivity Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The service that allows users to connect to the internet.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Exceptional workday
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Exception to the usual working day

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: InclusionType
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association class specifying the relationship between the subset of vessels described by an APPLIC data object and a regulation (restriction, recommendation, or nautical information).

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Location hours
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Working hours for a service or facility described by a geographic location

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Permission Type
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association class for associations describing whether the subsets of vessels determined by the ship characteristics specified in APPLIC may (or must, etc.) transit, enter, or use a feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Radio Service Control
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The radio control centre for a marine radio service

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Service contact
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Contact details for a service or facility

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Service Coordination
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The coordinating authority for a service area

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Spatial Association
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: An association for the binding between a spatial type and its spatial quality information.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Available Telemedical Assistance Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: Available Telemedical Assistance Service and related coordination centre.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:name: Transmission Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationAssociation.S100FC:definition: The radio transmission of a service area or facility

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Core aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between an aggregation feature that describes areas of varying uncertainty about a service or phenomenon and a geographic feature describing the service or phenomenon.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Fuzzy zone aggregation
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between an aggregation feature that describes areas of varying uncertainty about a service or phenomenon and zones of uncertainty about the service or phenomenon.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Service provision area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: Association linking the location from which a service is provided and the area(s) served.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:name: Text association
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureAssociation.S100FC:definition: A feature association for the binding between a geo feature and the cartographically positioned location for text.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Information Type
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Generalized information type which carries all the common attributes.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: AbstractRxN
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: An abstract superclass for information types that encode rules, recommendations, and general information in text or graphic form.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Applicability
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Describes the relationship between vessel characteristics and: (i) the applicability of an associated information object or feature to the vessel; or, (ii) the use of a facility, place, or service by the vessel; or, (iii) passage of the vessel through an area.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Authority
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: A person or organisation having political or administrative power and control.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Broadcast Details
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Description of the content and schedule of a service using broadcast technology of radiocommunications to deliver information (to every receiver within a direct range). Online resource to access the content may also be included.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Connectivity Quality of Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Information related to the Quality of Service (QoS) of the connectivity.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Contact Details
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Information on how to reach a person or organisation by postal, internet, telephone, telex and radio systems.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Nautical Information
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Nautical information about a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Non-Standard Working Day
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Days when many services are not available. Often days of festivity or recreation or public holidays when normal working hours are limited, especially a national or religious festival, etc.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Radio Control Centre
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: The control centre of the radio service or radio stations

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Recommendations
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Recommendations for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Regulations
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Regulations for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Restrictions
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Restrictions for a related area or facility.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Service Hours
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: The time when a service is available and known exceptions.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Spatial Quality
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: The indication of the quality of the locational information for features in a dataset.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Telemedical Assistance Service
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: A service to provide decision support and advice to the seafarer on board responsible for medical care.

S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:name: Transmission Details
S100FC:S100_FC_InformationType.S100FC:definition: Description of the radiocommunication service with respect to the radio method and radio channels for the transfer of information by means of signals.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Feature Type
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Generalized feature type which carries all the common attributes.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Connectivity Subscription Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: An area of connectivity coverage available for the subscription of connectivity service.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: GMDSS Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: An area defined for a global communications service based upon automated systems, both satellite based and terrestrial, to provide distress alerting and promulgation of maritime safety information for mariners.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Indeterminate Zone
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A region in which the perception of a phenomenon or the availability of a service is known only to a specified level of confidence.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: Indeterminate Zone features associated to the same fuzzy area aggregate must not overlap.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: METAREA
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A geographical sea area (which may include inland seas, lakes and waterways navigable by seagoing ships) established for the purpose of coordinating the broadcast of marine meteorological information.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: NAVAREA
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A geographical sea area (which may include inland seas, lakes and waterways navigable by seagoing ships) established for the purpose of coordinating the broadcast of navigational warnings.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: NAVTEX Service Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A unique and precisely defined sea area, wholly contained within the NAVTEX coverage area, for which maritime safety information is provided from a particular NAVTEX transmitter.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: NAVTEX coverage area means an area defined by an arc of a circle having a radius from the transmitter calculated according to the method and criteria given in IMO resolution A.801(19), as amended.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Radio Service Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: The area where a radio service can be obtained and the characteristics of the radio transmission.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: The features Radar Station and Radio Station are used to encode the point of transmission of the signal.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Radio Station
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A place equipped to transmit radio waves. Such a station may be either stationary or mobile, and may also be provided with a radio receiver.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: The transmission of a radio station may serve to provide mariners with a line of position (IHO Chart Specifications, M-4). The feature 'radio station' is used to encode the point of transmission of the signal.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Search and Rescue Region
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A defined geographical area where a specific country or organization is designated to coordinate and provide search and rescue services.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Weather Forecast and Warning Area
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: An area for which weather forecasts and warnings are provided for specified periods.
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:remarks: The periodic data attributes are used to encode the periods when seasonal forecasts and warnings are provided.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Fuzzy Area Aggregate
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Aggregation of a geographic feature describing a service or phenomenon with zones of different confidence about the availability of the service, occurrence of the phenomenon, or applicability of the information described by the geographic feature.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Radio Service Area Aggregate
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: Aggregation of areas where radio services from a single radio service are available to different levels of reliability.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Data Coverage
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: A geographical area that describes the coverage and extent of spatial objects.

S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:name: Quality of Non-Bathymetric Data
S100FC:S100_FC_FeatureType.S100FC:definition: An area within which a uniform assessment of the quality of the non-bathymetric data exists.
